notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, G.F. and R.A.; Data curation, R.A.; Formal analysis, L.P. (Laura Pistelli), S.N., V.V.E. and F.M.; Funding acquisition, L.P. (Luisa Pistelli); Investigation, G.F., L.P. (Laura Pistelli), S.N., V.V.E. and R.A.; Methodology, G.F. and F.M.; Project administration, L.P. (Luisa Pistelli); Supervision, A.Z., F.M. and L.P. (Luisa Pistelli); Writing—original draft, R.A.; Writing—review & editing, G.F., L.P. (Laura Pistelli), S.N., Valentina Virginia Ebani, F.M., R.A. and L.P. (Luisa Pistelli).
